Class TicTacToeBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • TicTacToeBoard
  • public class TicTacToeBoard
extends java.lang.Object
    TicTaToeBoard is a class that represents a tic tac toe board. This is where the board is created, players are added, and validation is done.
